name: Unamed Shooter Game
description:
I am a sixteen years old hobby game developer based in switzerland.  I love creating games in a short period of time. (like this one) 
If you end up likeing this project, please follow me on itch for more stuff in the future.
Also, I love chatting. If you are bored, we could chat together on discord (tiimo#4674)

Mac / Linux ( Windows) users can play the game online on my website.
